inclusion.criterion: tumor size > 3 cm or clinical evidence of axillary nodal involvement
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: histologically confirmed invasive mammary carcinoma that is HER2 overexpressing
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: negative serum pregnancy test within 7 days of starting study drug
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: kidney and liver function tests within 1.5 times the institutional upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: performance status (WHO/ECOG scale) 0-1 and life expectancy >6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no evidence of brain or leptomeningeal disease, or any other Stage IV disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no previous or current malignancies at other sites within the last 5 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: adequately treated cone-biopsied in situ carcinoma of the cervix uteri and basal or squamous cell carcinoma of the skin
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pregnancy or unwillingness to use a reliable contraceptive method in women of child-bearing potential
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: severe underlying chronic illness or disease
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: cardiomyopathy or baseline LVEF less than 50%
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer, HER2-positive and ER/PR negative. Axillary sampling revealed 5 positive lymph nodes.
